entry.lex: GMA New Media is a mass media company which makes mobile applications. They were founded on Jan 1, 2000 in the Philippines. They are headed up by Felipe Gozon, and are headquartered in the GMA Network Center.
GMA New Media is a media company in the Philippines. They were founded on Jan 1 2000, and are headed up by Felipe Gozon. Located in the GMA Network Center, they develop mobile applications.

GMA New Media, Inc., a mass media company that offers products such as mobile applications, was founded on January 1, 2000. GMA New Media, whose key person is Felipe Gozon, is located in the GMA Network Center in the Philippines.

GMA New Media, led by Felipe Gozon, is a mobile app creating media company. Established on New Years Day of the new millennium, the company provides Internet services. Philippine Entertainment Portal and Digify Inc are just two of the companyâ€™s subsidiaries.

GMA New Media is a media company that creates mobile apps and produces services for the web. Primarily led by Felipe Gozon, the company was created on January 1, 2000. Two of their subsidiaries include Philippine Entertainment Portal, Inc and Digify Inc.

GMA New Media, founded in January, 2000, is a media company which make websites and offers mobile application products. Its chairman and CEO is Felipe Gozon. GMA New Media subsidiaries include Philippine Entertainment Portal and Digify, Inc.
GMA New Media is a mass media company in the entertainment industry. They are headed up by Felipe Gozon, and are owned by GMA Network. They develop web sites and online games.

GMA New Media, Inc. is a media company that offers services in the entertainment industry: different internet services and online games. It is managed by Felipe Gozon, and it is a subsidiary of GMA Network.

GMA New Media, a mass media entertainment industry company, produces, offers World Wide Web-related services. The company also produces online games. The company is a subsidiary of parent company, GMA Network, and features Felipe Gozon as a key person.
Hypermarcas is a pharmaceutical drug company in Brazil. They were founded on Jan 1, 2001 as an S.A. corporation. Their key person is their CEO, and they have a net income of 108,600,000.
Hypermarcas was founded in Brazil on Jan 1, 2001. They are an S.A. corporation which produces pharmaceutical drugs. Their key person is their CEO, and they have a net income of $108,600,000.
Hypermarcas is an S.A. corporation who sells pharmaceuticals in Brazil. Their primary product is drugs. Managed by their CEO, they were founded on 1/1/2001 and have a $108,600,000 net income.

Hypermarcas was founded in Brazil on 2001-01-01. They are an S.A. corporation making drugs in the pharmaceutical industry. Their key person is a CEO, and they are the owners of the subsidiary Mantecorp.

Hypermarcas is a Brazilian pharmaceutical company whose main product is drugs. They were founded on January 1, 2001 as an S.A. corporation. They are managed by a CEO, and own the subsidiary Mantecorp.
Mantecorp is a subsidiary of the pharmaceutical company Hypermarcas, an S.A. Corporation located in Brazil, which was founded on January 1, 2001. Hypermarcas is ruled by a CEO.
